name: Wavey The Rocket - Demo
description:
Guide Wavey the Rocket on his galactic adventure to defeat The Evil2. Control the wave's shape to navigate our hero through a treacherous gauntlet that only Wavey is equipped to deal with. Taking inspiration from early 90s toys, cartoons and games, Wavey the rocket is a visually unique 3d side-scrolling action arcade game with a Gfunk inspired original soundtrack.

Join our discord community to give us feedback and help shape the development of Wavey!

https://discord.gg/DdygC23
